content.body: kriskowal: Wouldn't the debug ID / build ID solve a similar problem. As proposed now it would add a `//#sourceMapDebugId` field alongside the url in bundles.
content.formatted_body: kriskowal: Wouldn't the debug ID / build ID solve a similar problem. As proposed now it would add a //#sourceMapDebugId field alongside the url in bundles.

content.body: Then you an load source maps via URL + debug ID. On top you can actually verify after that you loaded the right source map (without rehashing)
